message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Seems fair, right?
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, I'll give you a little more this time, but I'm not budging much. Let's get this done.
Let's meet in the middle... of my side!
This is my final offer. If you want more, you'll have to wait until the next round, and the money will be worth less for both of us.
Getting a bit desperate, aren't we?
I'm giving you a chance to make a reasonable deal before the inflation really kicks in. Take it or leave it.
You're getting closer to losing everything. I'm being generous.
This is it, Bob. Either you take this, or we both get nothing. The clock is ticking.
You're running out of options. Take this before it's too late!
This is my absolute final offer. You can either take it, or risk getting nothing at all. The next round means nothing for either of us.
Last chance, Alice! This is as good as it gets for you. Take it or leave it!
